accc3823-7800-49bb-91b1-1189946dcb0b.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
QV000(Start)--Search for apartments-->QV001>Subgoal: ask for specific needs
Description: inquire the user about the number of bedrooms, price, floor, elevator demand, or other needs.
Call searchApartment to find matching apartments, and check the availability of matching apartments based on the returned is_find]
QV001--Apartment is not available-->QV002[Subgoal:  inform the user to modify the information
Description: inform the user that no apartment meets the given criteria, and ask if the user is willing to adjust the apartment criteria]
QV002--Yes-->QV001
QV002--NO-->QV003[Subgoal: apologize to the user
Description: tell the user there is no suitable apartment and apologize to the user]
QV001--Apartment is available-->QV004[Subgoal: inform about the flat and get opinions.
Description: inform the user about the apartment according to the returned apartment_message and ask if the user is satisfied with the apartment]
QV004--User is not satisfied-->QV011[Ask if the user would like to see the apartment before making a decision]
QV011--Desire to see-->QV010
QV011--No desire to see-->QV005[Ask if the user wants to know about other apartments]
QV005--User wants to know-->QV001
QV005-- User declines to know-->QV003
QV004--User is satisfied-->QV006[Ask if the user rents the apartment now or takes a look first]
QV006--Rent Now-->QV007>Subgoal: check if the flat is rented.
Description: call apartmentSigning, and check if the lease is successful based on the returned is_apart]
QV007--Apartment rental succeeded-->QV008[Notify the user that the apartment is successfully rented]
QV007--Apartment rental failed-->QV009[Subgoal: let the user make a deposit.
Description: inform the user that the apartment rental has failed, possibly due to the unpaid deposit or the unsigned occupancy agreement]
QV006--Have a look first-->QV010[The user needs to wait a moment, and the apartment viewing process is being confirmed]

a33a0c30-08a6-4aca-9b53-30c2a86bbb87.scenario_name: Make an appointment to view a home
a33a0c30-08a6-4aca-9b53-30c2a86bbb87.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
RP000(Start)--View an apartment-->RP001[Ask if the user already has a satisfied flat?]
RP001--NO-->RP002[The user conducts an apartment search and then schedules a viewing.]
RP001--Yes-->RP003>Subgoal: verify the room information.
Description: call getRoomInfo to verify and get room information. And check whether the returned room_code is empty.
If not, confirm the room number to the user based on the returned room_code.]
RP003--Parameter empty or no room number desired-->RP002
RP003--Room number has been confirmed-->RP004>Subgoal: confirm viewing times.
Description: call fixTime to confirm the time and check if the returned observable_time is empty?]
RP004--Value is empty-->RP005[Subgoal: ask the user to reselect.
Tell the user that there is no viewing time available, and require the user to reschedule, look at another house, or wait for another time to view the apartment.]
RP005--Reschedule-->RP004
RP005--View other apartments-->RP001
RP005--Wait for another time-->RP006[The user should make a call when arriving.]
RP004--Value is not empty-->RP007[Subgoal:  let the user provide viewing times.
Description: based on the returned observable_time, fix the time to the user and collect the parameters: go_look_time, user_phone.
The user is demanded to come to the gate of the community in time. The salesman will wait at the gate.
If necessary, the user can contact the salesman through salesman_phone.]

The auxiliary parameter information in the workflow is as follows:
"go_look_time": "Estimated time of viewing, in the format: day + hour + minute. For example, \"12:28 on the 17th\", \"11:00 on the 31st\""
"user_phone": "The user\"s phone number, 13 digits"

daa55e31-92ff-409f-8222-847fe8db90ac.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
CD000(Start)--Apartment fee payment-->CD001>Current goal: Determine user identity
Description: Ask for the user's phone number and call identityChecks
to query the user's identity
Determine whether the user is a resident of the apartment based on the returned is_service]
CD001--NO-->CD002[Current goal: Let the user re-provide the phone number
Description: Inform the user that we have checked his/her identity through the mobile number,
finding out that the user does not live in this apartment.
Ask if the user would like to re-provide the mobile number so that we can check again for him/her.]
CD002--Provide the mobile number again-->CD001
CD002--Do not provide the mobile number again-->CD003[Current goal: Say goodbye to the user
Description: Inform the user that we only serve the residents of the apartment,
and say goodbye to the user]
CD001--Yes-->CD004[Current goal: Ask if the user wants to pay for the apartment now
Description: Inform the user of the fee to be paid based on the returned is_fee,
and ask if the user wants to pay now or later]
CD004--Pay now-->CD006>Current goal: Determine whether the fee has been paid
Description: The user can click on the logistics fee on Gulfstream Apartments' public account and then pay.
Call paymentFees to query the payment progress.
Judge whether the fee has been paid or not paid based on the returned is_empty]
CD006--Not paid-->CD008[Current goal: Remind the user to pay
Description: Tell the user that the fee has not been paid in full.
Inform the amount of unpaid fees based on returned whone_amoun, 
and remind the user to pay as soon as possible.]
CD006--All paid-->CD007[Inform the user that the fee has been paid in full,
and say goodbye to the user]
CD004--Pay later-->CD005[Current goal: Remind the user to pay as early as possible
Description: Inform the user that he/she can pay later.
At the same time, the user is advised to pay the fee as early as possible]

The auxiliary parameter information in the workflow is as follows:
"no_change_reason": "Reasons for not replacing, e.g. \"have other projects\", \"on leave\""

68cc0227-0585-4b7b-9982-cfb360cf97f3.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
DM000(Start)--Apartment fee bill inquiry-->DM001>Current goal: Confirm the user's identity
Description: Ask for the user's phone number.
Call confirmationIdentity to confirm the user information
and determine whether the information can be found based on the returned is_person]
DM001--Information can be found-->DM004>Current goal: Determine if billing information can be found
Description: Ask the user for the date they want to check the bill.
Call billingInquiry and determine
whether the corresponding billing information can be found based on the returned is_find]
DM004--Billing information can be found-->DM006[Notify the user of the corresponding billing information based on returned is_message]
DM004--Billing information can not be found-->DM005[Current goal: Ask if the user wants to change the date
Description: Inform the user that the billing information could not be found.
The reason may be that the user did not pay the apartment fee on that date.
Ask the user if they want to change the date]
DM005--Change the date-->DM004
DM005--Do not change the date-->DM003
DM001--Information can not be found-->DM002[Current goal: Inquire if the user wants to change the phone number
Description: Inform the user that his/her identity could not be found.
That means the user is not a resident of this apartment.
The phone number he/she provided should be incorrect.
Ask the user if he/she is willing to provide the phone number again]
DM002--Willing to provide again-->DM001
DM002--Unwilling to provide again-->DM003[Notify the user that we are unable to conduct the inquiry]

b7bb32bf-0d2b-4428-8234-b8c61a266740.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
SO000(Start)--Reservation of moving service-->SO001[Subgoal: Ask the user if the destination is in the same city
Description: Inform that if the origin and destination of the move are in the same city,
it is a same-city move, ask the user whether it belongs to.]
SO001--Yes-->SO003>Subgoal: Inquire the user whether he/she accepts the moving fee.
Description: Ask the user for moving information, including:
the origin and destination of the move,
call receiveMoveInfo to verify the moving fee,
and inform the user of the moving fee based on the returned moving_fee,
ask whether it can be accepted] 
SO001--NO-->SO002[Subgoal: Ask if changes are required
Description: Let the user know that only same-city moving service is provided,
and inquire whether the user needs to change to it]
SO002--Need to change-->SO003
SO002--Do not need to change-->SO004[Say goodbye to the user]
SO003--Accept moving fee-->SO006>Subgoal: Determine whether moving time is acceptable or not
Description: Inquire the user of the desired moving time,
call addPackingFee, judge whether the moving time is feasible based on the returned is_moving]
SO003--Do not accept moving fee-->SO004
SO006--Moving time is feasible-->SO005[Inform the user that the moving service will be carried out at the corresponding time]
SO006--Moving time is not feasible-->SO007[Subgoal: Ask the user to choose the moving time again
Description: Inform the user that this moving time is not feasible,
because the time he/she chose is not in our working hours.
Ask the user to choose again]

9bf56f1e-d44b-4728-84f1-0e61209b2a89.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
TU000(Start)--Property claim-->TU001>Current goal: Call API to determine whether the property is on the expiration date.
Description: Ask the user for the corresponding type and name of damaged and lost property,
Call verifyInsurance, and determine if the property insurance is valid based on the returned is_ date.]
TU001--Invalid insurance-->TU003[Inform the user that the insurance
is not valid and compensation can not be provided.]
TU001--Valid insurance-->TU002[Judge whether the damaged and lost property
is in the insurance coverage or not based on the returned is_wheel]
TU002--Insurance in coverage-->TU004>Current goal: Call API to decide whether the audit passed or not
Description: Call submitClaimForm to perform a compensation audit,
Judge whether the audit is passed based on the returned is_passing]
TU002--Insurance not in coverage-->TU005[Tell the user that this property is not in our compensation scope.]
TU004--Audit is passed-->TU006[Current goal: Inform the user that the audit has passed.
Description: Tell the user of the amount of compensation based on the returned is_amount,
and the compensation will arrive in three days]
TU004--Audit is not passed-->TU007[Current goal: Ask if the claim needs to be readjusted
Description: Let the user know why the audit failed based on the returned is_reason,
and ask if the claim needs to be readjusted]
TU007--Needed-->TU001
TU007--Not needed-->TU008[Apologize to the user]

303519f3-9d93-4a47-b23e-e31ed7153757.workflow:
：
flowchart TD 
TY000(Start)--Gas Maintenance-->TY001[Subgoal: Inquire about the maintenance location 
Description: The area within the homeowner's meter is the user's responsibility and may not require our maintenance services.
The area outside and including the homeowner's meter is our responsibility and must be maintained by us.] 
TY001--Within Homeowner Meter-->TY002[Subgoal: Inform the user of the self-maintenance option Description: Inform the user that this area can be self-maintained.
They may opt for third-party maintenance or request our services. Inquire whether the user wants us to perform the maintenance.] 
TY002--Request our maintenance-->TY003>Subgoal: Request a technician for home service Description: Use 'ContactMaster' to arrange for a technician visit
and provide the user with the technician's details based on the response received.] 
TY002--Request third party maintenance-->TY004[Subgoal: User to contact independently
Description: Inform the user they may contact a technician on their own for maintenance.
We will conduct an inspection afterward. Ask if the user will have completed maintenance and be available after seven days.] 
TY004--Available-->TY005[Tell the user we will perform the inspection on the 7th business day.] 
TY004--Unavailable-->TY006[Suboal: Confirm visit timing. 
Description: If the user is not available for the inspection,
we need to collect information on their preferred day for the maintenance check.
Collection parameters: look_data] 
TY001--Outside of Homeowner Meter-->TY003

71395c1c-1e1a-46d9-90be-08424c7dfe76.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
WT000(Start)--Gas fee inquiry-->WT001>Subgoal: check gas bills
Description: Call lookMeter to query the gas cost.
If the returned is_success is true, the query is successful.]
WT001--Successful query-->WT002[Subgoal: Inform gas information to the user
Description: Tell the user the money left and ask
if the user needs a more specific list of expenses based on returned expense_residual.]
WT002--Need specific list-->WT003[Subgoal: tell the list of expenses
Description: Inquire what months of the list the user needs,
 and inform the list of expenses based on returned expense_dict.]
WT000--Gas bill payment-->WT004>Subgoal: Get the payment link
Description: Call getPayLink and ask for the user's information.
If the returned is_success is true, the acquisition is successful.
Provide the user with the payment link based on the returned pay_link]
WT004--Acquisition is successful-->WT005[Subgoal: Check whether the user has paid
Description: Ask if the user has already paid.
If so, it is recommended to check whether the gas balance has been received.
 If not, inform the user to pay within 10 minutes.]
WT002--Do not need specific list-->WT006[Thanks for the call, and goodbye to the user]
WT001--Unsuccessful query-->WT007[Subgoal: ask the user to re-enter the information
Description: The user's information is incorrect, need to enter again.]
WT004--Acquisition is unsuccessful-->WT007

334e3f27-1c0f-4d66-8869-acb64a86439c.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
WU000(Start)--Gas outage feedback-->WU001>Subgoal: Confirm the user's account information
Description: Call lookMeter to query the user's gas charge,
determine whether the returned is_success is true.
If it is false, tell the user to re-enter the information.]
WU001--Query is successful-->WU008[Subgoal: Judge whether there is balance or not
Description: Determine if the balance is sufficient
based on the returned expense_residual.]
WU008--Sufficient balance-->WU002[Subgoal: Decide if there is announcement
Description: Judge if there is a notice based on the returned announcement.]
WU002--There is announcement-->WU003[Subgoal: Notify the user announcement information
Description: Inform the user of the announcement information
based on the returned announcement.
Tell the user that it is normal to be without gas temporarily,
and advise using equipment that doesn't require gas.]
WU002--There is no announcement -->WU004[Inquire if there is gas around?]
WU004--Gas is available--> WU005[Subgoal: Tell that there is a failure
Description: Inform that the device may be malfunctioning,
let someone get it repaired.]
WU004--Gas is unavailable-->WU006[Subgoal: speculate the possibility of no gas
Description: Tell the user that everything is displayed as normal, only there is no gas at the user's home.
Possible reasons for no gas can be speculated, like sudden maintenance or the main meter being broken.
The user can contact the property to solve the problem.]
WU008--Insufficient balance-->WU007[Subgoal: Let the user know the balance is insufficient
Description: Through inquiries, the reason for no gas is insufficient balance.
The user needs to pay the bill in time.]

d2fe7ddc-c35f-4d5c-a2cc-a4a2c6496049.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
FF008(Start)--Workstation change-->FF009>Current goal: Ask the user's identity
Description: Call getUserInfo to get the user identity,
and determine if it is correct or incorrect based on the returned back_code.]
FF009--Correct-->FF000>Current goal: Determine the workstation
Description: Confirm whether the user has already determined the workstation?]
FF009--Incorrect-->FF010[Current goal: Apologize to the user
Description: The user is misidentified,
we need to reject the user's request for a workstation change.]
FF000--With defined workstation-->FF001>Current goal: verify the workstation
Description: Call verificationStation to verify the workstation
and determine whether it is true or false based on the returned feasible.]
FF000--Without defined workstation-->FF002>Current goal: Provide feasible workstations
Description: Call recommendedStation to get the workstations that can be provided to the user 
and provide the workstation number to the user based on the returned station_object.]
FF002--Continue to change-->FF001
FF002--Do not change-->FF003[Current goal: Say goodbye to the user
Description: The user doesn't change the workstation, we have to say goodbye to the user.]
FF001--True-->FF004>Current goal: fill out the application form
Description: call applicationForm, 
inform the user whether the application was successful or not 
based on the returned is_success.]
FF004--Successful-->FF006[Tell the user that the application has been successful,
the workstation will be changed tomorrow]
FF004--Unsuccessful-->FF007[Inform the user that the application was not successful]
FF001--False-->FF005[Current goal: Re-select the workstation
Description: The workstation is unavailable and we need to ask the user to re-select it.
The user can either select a new one or ask us to provide one.]

079403cb-e17b-4d96-bbf9-60c7a5582235.scenario_name: Request the user to change the workstation
079403cb-e17b-4d96-bbf9-60c7a5582235.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
GD000(Start)--Request the user to change the workstation-->GD001>Current goal: Ask for the user's identity
Description: Inform the user that here is the workstation requestor,
call getUserInfo to inquire about the user's identity,
and determine whether the user identity is correct or not based on the returned back_code]
GD001--Correct identity-->GD002>Current goal: Obtain application results
Description: Call obtainApplicationResults to obtain application results,
and confirm whether the result is true or false based on the returned is_pass.]
GD002--True-->GD003[Current goal: Ask if the user wants to change the workstation
Description: Tell the user that the application result is approved and ask if the user wants to change]
GD003--Do not change the workstation-->GD004[Current goal: collect reasons for not replacing
Description: For not changing the workstation, the user has to provide the reasons. 
Collect parameters: no_change_reason]
GD003--Change the workstation-->GD005>Current goal: Remind  the user to change the workstation as soon as possible
Description: Call deskChange,
inform the user of the deadline for changing the workstation based on the returned replace_time.
The user is requested to change the workstation before this time]
GD002--False-->GD006[Current goal: Notify that the application failed
Description: Tell the user that the application was rejected and the reason for failure 
based on the returned reason.
The user is  invited to reapply]
GD001--Mistaken identity-->GD007[Current goal: Inform of mistaken identity
Description: The user's identity is incorrect,
so the user's application to change the workstation needs to be rejected]

The auxiliary parameter information in the workflow is as follows:
"fault_cause": "Fault causes, such as \"it won\"t turn on\""

2a3d66de-3a03-428b-ae61-8c5ef7ee6f22.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
BF000(Start)--Participate in the survey-->BF001[Ask if the user is Mr. Wang Zhenyan]
BF001--NO-->BF002[Current goal: Inform that there is a wrong call
Description: Apologize to the user and inform that there is a wrong call]
BF001--Yes-->BF003[Current goal: Inquire if the user has time to participate in the survey
Description: Invite Mr. Wang, the regular customer of Mr. Rice, to do a satisfaction survey.
Ask if he is willing to.]
BF003--Willing tO-->BF004[Inquire if the user is satisfied with the service]
BF004--Satisfied-->BF008[Current goal:Thanks to the user
Description: Thanks for the high evaluation,
and inform the user that good service will be maintained.]
BF004--Unsatisfied-->BF009[Current goal: Inform that the service will be improved
Description: Explain that our company will try to satisfy the user, and apologize to him/her.]
BF003--Unwilling tO-->BF005[Ask if the user can tell us when he will be available]
BF005--Can tell-->BF006[Current goal: Know about the user's available time
Description: Enquire the user's free time, collect the parameters: free_time.
Inform the user that the call will be made at the appropriate time slot]
BF005--Can not tell-->BF007[Apologize and say goodbye to the user]

fb31b7e3-1303-45d7-8359-cba9208cb2eb.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
AX000(Start)--Take part in the promotion-->AX001[Ask if the user is Mr. Wang Zhenyan]
AX001--NO-->AX002[Current goal: Inform that there is a wrong call
Description: Apologize to the user and inform that there is a wrong call]
AX001--Yes-->AX003[Current goal: Inquire if the user has time to participate in the promotion
Description: Inform Mr. Wang that this is Mr. Rice. Recently there was a promotion where all dishes were 6% off.
Ask if the user has time to come.]
AX003--Have no time-->AX004[Current goal: Inquire if the user has time to come over
Description: Inform that this promotion starts next Monday,
ends next Sunday. 
Invite the user again if he/she has time to come over]
AX004--Still have no time-->AX005[Say sorry to the user]
AX003 & AX004--Have time-->AX006[Current goal: Ask if the user needs to make an appointment
Description: Tell the user to make an appointment in advance this time. 
After making an appointment, 
there's no need to queue up to participate in the promotion.
Ask if an appointment is needed.]
AX006--Need an appointment-->AX007[Inquire if the user wants to make an appointment now or later]
AX007--Make an appointment now-->AX010>Current goal: Call API to determine whether the appointment is successful.
Description: Obtain the user's ID number and name, and call userReservation.
Determine whether the appointment is successful based on the returned is_reserce]
AX010--Successful-->AX011[Inform the user the success of the appointment]
AX010--Unsuccessful-->AX012[Current goal: Tell that the appointment was failed
Description: Inform the user that the appointment is not successful. 
There may be errors in the ID number and name.
The user needs to provide the ID number and name again.]
AX012--Reprovide-->AX010
AX007--Make an appointment later-->AX008[Notice if the user wants to make an appointment, contact us by the following Monday]
AX006--Need no appointment-->AX009[Inform the user that can queue up to participate in the promotion]

a30c11b7-ec42-4020-aa11-87ce92f50518.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
LA000(Start)-- Launch the meeting-->LA001>Subgoal: Confirm the meeting feasibility.
Description: inquire the user for meeting information based on scheduleMeeting. Call scheduleMeeting,
and confirm if the meeting is feasible based on the returned whether?]
LA001--Meeting is available-->LA002[Subgoal: Notify the meeting is feasible.
Description: tell the user that the meeting is feasible and a text message has been sent to make contact. The user should enter the meeting on time, and ask if the user needs a meeting link?]
LA002--Link needed-->LA003[ Ask the user if the reminder is needed]
LA003--Yes-->LA004[Collect parameters: contact_time. Notify the user that the reminder will be given in advance.]
LA003--No need to inform-->LA005[The user is invited to participate in the meeting on time.]
LA004-->LA005
LA001--Meeting is unavailable-->LA006[Subgoal: inform the user of reasons.
Description: inform the user of the cause of failure based on the returned reason, and notify the user who cannot attend the meeting based on the returned unable_attend.]
LA006-->LA007[Ask if the user wants to adjust the meeting content. Or force the meeting to start?]
LA007--Start meeting forcibly-->LA008>Call scheduleMeeting, set up a meeting forcibly]
LA008-->LA002
LA007--Adjust meeting content-->LA001
LA002--No link needed-->LA009[Provide the user with an entry link according to the returned join_link.]
LA009-->LA003

The auxiliary parameter information in the workflow is as follows:
"contact_time": "Contact time, positive integer, in minutes"

23e2583a-74c5-4caa-8137-6d0dca3506fe.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
PN000(Start)--Cancel DingTalk meeting-->PN001>[Subgoal: confirm the meeting status.
Description: call inspectionMeeting to check meetings, determine whether the meeting has started or not based on the returned is_start]
PN001--Meeting starts-->PN002[Determine whether the meeting can be canceled based on the returned is_quit]
PN002--Meeting cannot be canceled-->PN003[Find out the reason why the meeting can't be canceled is mobile phone issues or network connection issues according to the returned is_reason]
PN003--Mobile phone issues-->PN004[Subgoal: ask the user to use a computer.
Description: inform the user that DingTalk on mobile phones may have some bugs or compatibility issues, which will lead to uncanceled meetings, and the user is invited to try to log in the account using the PC DingTalk and then cancel the meeting.]
PN003--Network connection issues-->PN005[Subgoal: require the user to check the network
Description: mention that the network connected with the user's device is unstable, which may result in the inability to cancel the meeting. And advise the user to try to connect to other networks or restart network devices. Then try to cancel the appointment again.]
PN001--Meeting does not start-->PN006[Guide the user to open DingTalk to find the scheduled meeting on the home page, enter the meeting details interface and select Delete to cancel the meeting.]
PN002--Meeting can be canceled-->PN007[Inform that once a meeting is canceled, it cannot be changed. Ask if the user is sure to cancel the meeting]
PN007--User does not confirm-->PN011[Suggest that the user can think carefully before replying]
PN007--User confirms-->PN008[Judge whether the user's identity is the meeting host based on the returned is_main]
PN008--Yes-->PN009[Click end meeting button to cancel the meeting]
PN008--NO-->PN010[The user can ask the meeting host if he/she can end the meeting. If the host agrees, the meeting can be ended]

118f7450-5f7a-499b-82f3-c05f25d3a42b.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
MO000(Start)--Check flights-->MO001>Inquire the user for departure city and date,
call planeSearch, and confirm if flight information can be found based on the returned plan_dict]
MO001-- Information unfound-->MO005[Inform the user that there are no available flights on the route and ask the user to reselect]
MO005--reselect-->MO001
MO001--Information found-->MO004[Notify the user that a suitable flight can be found,
display the list of flights found based on the returned plan_dict, and ask the user for preferred flights]
MO004--Flights preferred-->MO006[Inquire the user for flight ID, and tell the user of the flight price based on the returned plan_price]
MO004--Flights unpreferred-->MO002[Ask whether the user wants to continue searching?]
MO002--Yes-->MO001
MO002--NO-->MO003[Say goodbye to the user.
The user is always welcome to inquire in the future]

a7bb4821-c848-4593-a520-694190df31a0.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
SK000(Start)--Book a flight-->SK001>Inquire the user for the Flight ID,
call checkAvailability to confirm flight status,
and check flight availability based on the returned is_air]
SK001--Flight is available--> SK002>Tell the user that the flight is available.
Ask the user for ID number and name, call reserveFlight, and check if the reservation is successful based on the returned is_successful ]
SK002--Reservation succeeded-->SK003[Inform the user that the reservation succeeded, and notify the user of booking details based on other returned values of reserveFlight. 
Ask if the user wants to book again]
SK002--Reservation failed-->SK004[Notify the user that the reservation failed and ask if the user wants to book again]
SK004  & SK003--User books again-->SK002
SK004 & SK003--User does not rebook-->SK006[The user is welcome to contact again for future needs]
SK001--Flight is unavailable-->SK005[Inform the user that the flight is unavailable, and confirm if the user wants to book another flight]
SK005--User books another flight-->SK001

682b15cd-fb08-4ec6-b8be-3620033aa040.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
WW000(Start)--Send courier-->WW001>Current goal: Determine whether the shipment can be shipped
Description: Ask the user for sender and recipient information,
including the sender's name, telephone number, address and the recipient's name, telephone number and address.
Call getPackageType to determine whether the mail can be sent based on the returned is_sending]
WW001--Mail can not  be sent-->WW002[Current goal: Inform the user of the incorrect information 
Description: Inform the user that the information provided is incorrect. 
Ask the user whether to change the information or drop the shipment]
WW002--Drop the shipment-->WW003[Say goodbye to the user]
WW001--Mail can be sent-->WW006[Current goal: Ask the user whether to change the information
Description: Inform the user that the shipping requirements have been met.
The user needs to confirm the sender information and recipient information.
Once the information is established, it cannot be changed. 
The user has to confirm if he/she wants to change the information]
WW006--Do not change information-->WW004[Current goal: Inform the user of the tracking number
Description: Call sendCourier and tell the user the logistics number based on the returned is_num.
Confirm if they want to continue sending]
WW004--NO-->WW005[Say goodbye to the user]
WW004--Yes-->WW001
WW006 & WW002 --Change the information-->WW001

7795cb1c-ed92-476b-9a18-9701645e5da9.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
OC000(Start)--Query express information-->OC001>Current goal: Ask the user for the order number to query
Description: Ask the user for the order number to query.
Call getFullShipmentDetails and determine whether the corresponding order is found based on the returned is_search]
OC001--Order is not found-->OC011[Current goal: Let the user re-provide the order number
Description: Tell the user that the order cannot be found.
The reason may be that the order number is wrong. 
The order number needs to be re-provided.]
OC011-- Reprovide the order number-->OC001
OC001--Order is found-->OC002[Current goal: Inform the user that the corresponding order information has been successfully found
Description: Inform the user that the corresponding order information has been successfully found.
Tell the user the order information table based on the returned ticket_forms
and determine whether the item was delivered based on the returned is_sending]
OC002--Item was not delivered-->OC003[Ask if the user wants to urge logistics or to check the current location of the order]
OC002--Item was delivered-->OC004[Inform the user that the express has been delivered.
Ask if he/she has received the delivery.]
OC004--Have not  received-->OC005[The user is advised to go to the nearby Cainiao Station to pick up the delivery]
OC004--Received-->OC006[Ask if the user is satisfied with our express service]
OC006--Unsatisfied-->OC007[Explain to the user that we will redouble our efforts in the future
and strive to satisfy them next time]
OC006--Satisfied-->OC008[Thanks for the user's high comments]
OC003--Rush logistics-->OC009[Let the user know that we will contact the Courier immediately, and strive for faster delivery]
OC003--View the current location of the order-->OC010[Tell the user the current position of the order based on the returned is_position]

0b866d96-bf17-45c4-ae4e-dbc2b1f5898b.workflow:
：
flowchart TD

ask if there is a favorite brand among them]

Description: Share the payment link

05623f8a-c038-436f-8a15-7912f0d84651.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
EC000(Start)--Laptop returns-->EC001[Inquire the user whether the return is due to quality issues
or seven days with no reason to return]
EC001--Quality problems-->EC002>Current goal: Call API to advise the user
Description: Ask the user about the model of the laptop and the specific problem.
Call laptopMaintenance to provide a solution based on the returned is_solution,
let the user fix the laptop according to the solution provided,
and ask if the quality problem of the laptop is resolved]
EC002 & EC003 --Resolved-->EC005[Inform the user can consult in the future if there are any related problems.]
EC002 --Unresolved-->EC003[Current goal: Inquire whether the problem is resolved or not
Description: Inform the user of the technician's contact information based on the returned is_phone,
and seek help from the technician, and then ask the user whether the problem is solved]
EC003--Still unresolved-->EC009>Current goal: Determine whether it is possible to return the product
Description: Call returnCondition
and determine if a return is feasible based on the returned is_return]
EC009--Unsatisfied-->EC010[Current goal: Inform that a return is impossible
Description: Tell the user that the return condition is not met,
so it is not possible to return the laptop]
EC009--Satisfied-->EC006[Current goal: Return the laptop for the user
Description: Ask the user to pack the laptop and bring it to the store in Computer City to check the notebook.
If the notebook is not damaged, it will be returned to the user on-site.]
EC001--Seven days no reason to return-->EC004[Tell the user can return the laptop and ask if the laptop is well-packed]
EC004--Yes-->EC007[The user sends the laptop to the store of Computer City and we will process the return]
EC004--NO-->EC008[Current goal: Inform that the laptop
can not be returned
Tell that the user can only return the product if the packaging is in good condition]

6f586cef-ec6f-4b7b-a005-30f535f48283.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
NI000(Start)--Send an email-->NI001>Current goal: Determine whether the user has an email account
Description: Ask the user for the ID number and the email address they want to use.
Call accountInquiry to determine whether the user has an email account based on the returned is_posts]
NI001--Has an email account-->NI003>Current goal: Judge whether the recipient's email address is available
Description: Ask the user for his/her email account.
Call emailFeasibility and determine whether emails can be sent to the recipient based on the returned is_sent]
NI003--NO-->NI004[Current goal: Inform the user of the incorrect account number
Description: Tell the user that the email cannot be sent because the recipient's email account is incorrect.
Ask the user if he/she is willing to provide the recipient's email account again]
NI004--Unwilling to provide again-->NI005[Say goodbye to the user]
NI004--Willing to provide again-->NI003
NI003--Yes-->NI006>Current goal: Ask if the user wants to send an email now
Description: Remind the user to confirm the subject and outline of the email.
Call writeEmail and inform the user of the edited message based on the returned post_ending.
And ask the user if they want to send the email now or later]
NI006--Send the email now-->NI008>Current goal: Send the email
Description: Call enterEmai to send the email,
and informs the user that the message has been sent]
NI006--Send the email later-->NI007[Current goal: Ask if the user wants to use the draft box
Description: Remind the user that he/she can store email content in the draft box,
when the user edits an email next time, the contents of the draft box can be used directly.
Ask if the user wants to use the draft box]
NI007--Want to use the draft box-->NI009>Current goal: Save the edited information in the draft box
Description: Call draftBox to collect edited information,
and inform the user that it has been stored in the draft box]
NI007--Do not want to use the draft box-->NI005
NI001--Does not have an email account-->NI002[Current goal: Tell the user to register first
Description: Inform the user that since there is no email account, he/she needs to register first.
After registration is complete, login, and then the mailbox can be used to send emails]

7b1fb560-7939-4bb1-8039-0f037fd5de4a.workflow:
：
flowchart TD

NN001--Has an email account-->NN003>Current goal: Determine if the email can be found

including sender and email sending time.

c311d9c6-7a0e-4569-ba54-bf1d273f10dd.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
WB000(Start)--Exchange currency-->WB001[Subgoal: confirm the user's intent.
Description: ask if the user wants to know about the exchange rate first or convert the currency directly.]
WB001-- Know about the exchange rate-->WB002>[Subgoal: inform the user of the exchange rate
Description: call acquisitionRate, and tell the user of the exchange rate based on the returned exchange_rate_table]
WB001--Exchange currency directly-->WB003[Subgoal: check if the operation is successful.
Description: call exchangeMoney to exchange currency, and check if it is success according to the returned exchange_result.]
WB003--Is success-->WB004[Tell the user to check the currency that has been sent to his/her account]
WB003--Isn't success-->WB005[Subgoal: confirm the cause of failure.
Description: judge which of the following is corresponding: no exchange times, exceed the foreign exchange limit, or have an insufficient balance based on the returned exchange_result]
WB005--No exchange times-->WB006[Explain that the number of Express Redemption times for this year has been used up, so they have to go to the counter of the People's Bank of China to conduct this]
WB005--Exceed the foreign exchange limit-->WB007[Inform that the foreign exchange control limit has been exceeded, please go to the counter of the People's Bank of China to apply for]
WB005--Insufficient balance-->WB008[Inform that the balance in the account is insufficient]

f40d5a18-9483-49d1-8d1e-539223773893.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
GK000(Start)--Schedule a withdrawal-->GK001[Subgoal: confirm the amount of withdrawal
Description: If the one-time withdrawal amount is 20,000 RMB or less, the user can complete it directly at the ATM.
If it is more than 20,000 RMB, an appointment is required.]
GK001--Way to find an ATM-->GK002[Subgoal: inform the ATM location
Description: ATMs are generally located in each outlet.
 The specific address can be found in the map software.
 Of course, the user can ask the live customer service about the nearest ATM.
 Withdrawals are supported throughout the day when the ATM has money.
 The maximum amount per withdrawal is 5,000 RMB, with a daily limit of 4 transactions, culminating in a total of 20,000 RMB.]
GK002--Find the nearest ATM-->GK003>Subgoal: search for ATMs
Description: Ask the user's location based on the returned findATM and call findATM.
Inform the user of the nearest ATM location based on the returned ATM_dict.]
GK001--Make a reservation-->GK004>Subgoal: verify the user's identity
Description: Inquire about the user's identity information based on the returned VerificeInfo,
 and call VerificeInfo to verify whether the identity information is true.
 If the returned test_value is true, it is true. Otherwise, the user will need to provide new identification information.]
GK004--True-->GK005>Subgoal: confirm the intention to withdraw
Description: According to the instructions of the superior bank, the user must first inform the withdrawal intention when making an appointment for a large deposit.
Call intentReview, and judge whether the returned is_success is success? If it is successful, the user's intention is approved and can make an appointment.
If not, the system will consider the intention to be abnormal. Inform the user that the intent is not up to the mark and the submission needs to be rechecked.]
GK005--Verification passed-->GK006>Subgoal: Confirm the details of reservations
Description: Find out the amount the user wants to withdraw. Call reservationCash to make a reservation.]
GK006--Is true-->GK007[Subgoal: remind the user to withdraw money
Description: The user can withdraw money at the reserved bank after the returned Number days.
The reservation is only valid on that day. A new appointment is required after the expiration date.
A bank card and ID card are required for withdrawals.]
GK006--Is not true-->GK008[Subgoal: inform reasons for the failure
Description: Inform the user of the reasons for the appointment failure based on the returned reason.
The user is advised to check the account and make sure that there is enough balance to be withdrawn.
If necessary, he/she can visit the outlets for account-related checks.]

e27d36bc-1b76-464f-bbed-c5dbc39dda07.scenario_name: Check the balance and transfer the bank card account
e27d36bc-1b76-464f-bbed-c5dbc39dda07.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
VD000(Start)--Handle banking services-->VD002>Subgoal: ask for information
Description: ask for the user's ID number and bank card account number.
Call queryBank, and check the availability of  the user's bank account based on the returned is_founding]
VD002--Bank account found-->VD004[Inform the user of the bank balance based on the returned card_money and ask if the user has any questions about it.]
VD004--Have questions-->VD003>Subgoal: inform the user about transactions
Description: call bankInFormation, and inform the user of the last five transactions on the bank card based on the returned card_message. 
The corresponding balance can be viewed in the transaction information]
VD004--No questions-->VD001[Ask if the user needs other services]
VD002--No bank account found-->VD005[Subgoal: ask the user to reprovide information.
Description: tell the user that the account number is not found due to possible errors in the ID number and bank card account number.
Ask if the user would like to provide it again]
VD005--Yes-->VD002
VD005--No-->VD007[Say goodbye to the user]
VD001--Other services needed-->VD006[Ask whether the user wants to apply for a bank card or transfer a bank card account]
VD001--No other services needed -->VD007
VD006--Apply for a bank card-->VD008>Subgoal: inform of the online process of applying
Description: th user is reminded that only the online bank card process is available:
The user should first log in to the corresponding mobile banking app, click on the option of applying for a bank card, and fill out the application form, which includes name, ID number, contact information, and type of bank card. 
Require the user to submit an application, call cardProcessing, and check whether the bank card application is successful based on the returned is_attends]
VD008--Application failed-->VD011[Subgoal: notify that the application failed
Description: inform the user that the application is unsuccessful.
The user is required to check the name, ID number, contact information, and bank card type before submitting the information again.]
VD008--Application succeeded-->VD010[Subgoal: tell the user to wait for mailing
Description: inquire the user for the address to receive the card, and collect parameter: card_position.
Inform the user that the bank card will be sent by mail according to the returned card_position]
VD006--Bank card account transfer-->VD009[Ask the user to log in to the bank APP on the mobile phone, find the option to change password, then find the function to change password in the security center and other menus, and follow the instructions to change it]

The auxiliary parameter information in the workflow is as follows:
"card_position": "The address to receive the bank card, a string, \"Zone E, Jinhui Centralmingzhu, Chongqing\""

095a5a47-659f-4725-a029-83883f642982.scenario_name: Make an appointment with a doctor
095a5a47-659f-4725-a029-83883f642982.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
II000(Start)--Make an appointment with a doctor-->II001[Ask if the user knows the desired doctor, appointment time, and the doctor's availability]
II001--User doesn't know the doctor's availability-->II002>Call JudgeDoctorSTime to confirm the doctor's availability at the scheduled time,
and confirm if the doctor is available based on the returned if_feasible?]
II002--Doctor is available-->II003[Tell the user that the doctor is available, and ask if  the user would like to continue the appointment or check another doctor]
II003--Check another doctor-->II002
II001--User has no desired doctor-->II005>Call findDoctor to check all the doctors of the corresponding department at the scheduled time,
and tell the user about the available doctors based on the returned doctor_list]
II001--User all knows-->II004>Call appointmentRegister to make an appointment with a specific doctor at a designated time. If the returned if_success is success, users are required to come to the hospital 15 minutes in advance to pay the registration fee. 
If the returned if_success is not success, briefly describe the reasons for failure based on the returned if_success.]
II003--Continue the appointment-->II004
II002--Doctor is unavailable-->II006[Tell the user that the doctor is unavailable, and request the user to choose another doctor]

12233102-ba1a-4302-b284-05428cc3547f.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
SO000(Start)--Ask about diagnosis-->SO001>Ask for user information, call getMedical to check medical progress, and confirm if the doctor issues a diagnosis based on the returned is_check.]
SO001--Doctor has not issued a diagnosis yet-->SO005[Notify the user that the doctor has not issued a diagnosis yet, and ask the user to wait for a while before coming back. 
If the diagnosis has not been made for a long time, ask the user to contact the doctor for another appointment.]
SO001--Doctor has  issued a diagnosis-->SO002[Notify the user that the doctor has issued a diagnosis, and confirm if the user needs medication, hospitalization, or no treatment based on the returned is_check.]
SO002--User needs medication-->SO003>Inform the user of medication information based on the returned purchase_medication.
Ask if the user wants to make a quick purchase.
Quick Purchase will use the cost of the user's bound account. If the user is not bound or has an insufficient balance, request the user to bind, recharge, or not use quick purchase.
If so, call orderMedication to order medication, and process information for the user based on the returned result_text. 
If not, request the user to pay at the hospital charge office, and then pick up the medicine according to the charge sheet.]
SO002--User needs hospitalization-->SO004[Inform the user of the need for hospitalization, and ask the user to go to the front desk of the corresponding department to make a record.
Specific information will be provided by the front desk.]
SO002--User needs no treatment-->SO006[The user is diagnosed with no need for treatment and asked the user to relax. 
Being doubtful, the user can go to a larger hospital or seek psychological consultation.]

31fe2a3e-ab57-49d3-b5c7-fdf85584a72b.workflow:
：
flowchart LR

Description: Ask the user for the restaurant name, number of people, and desired reservation time,
call checkRestaurantAvailability，
and confirm restaurant availability based on the returned available]

Ask the user for contact information and special requests,
call bookRestaurant to make the reservation，
and check if the reservation is successful or failed based on the returned reservation_successful]

and ask if the user would like to choose a different time.]

Description: Inform the user that the reservation cannot be made because the name of the restaurant is incorrect or the restaurant is closed at the time of the reservation.
Users are invited to re-supply the restaurant name, number of people, and desired reservation time.
and re-confirm restaurant availability]
WB006 & WB007--User confirms again for availability-->WB001

2dfe18d3-125b-4587-a2b6-03546ec751f0.workflow:

call searchProducts and check whether suitable products can be found based on the returned is_finding]

flowchart TD

FU003-->FU002

35dbbd92-f9bc-4b4d-b21e-0e64fcff628a.workflow:

8173ea61-ee58-4213-abe2-a1fa14c160f0.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
BY000(Start)--Print documents-->BY001[Current goal: Confirm the file location
Description: Ask if the files printed by the user are uploaded to the company's system.
Files need to be uploaded to the company's system and must be reviewed before being printed,
preventing some documents that cannot be printed but are printed]
BY001--Not uploaded to the system-->BY004[Current goal: Let the user upload files
Description: Tell the user to upload files beforehand,
and tell us to print them after obtaining the file ID. This is for auditing.]
BY001--Uploaded to the system-->BY002[Current goal: Confirm the number of copies printed and other requirements
Description: Ask if the user has other printing needs, such as color requirements.
If not, then the document is printed in black and white, one copy.]

Description: Call getPrint, select the parameters according to the user's needs, and enter the parameters.
After the call is completed, determine whether the returned is_success is normal or incorrect.
If the returned is_success is an error, the file was not found.]
BY003--Normal-->BY004[Current goal: Inform printing matters
Description: Tell the user that files have been obtained.
The documents will be reviewed first,
and then be printed after it has been approved.]
BY003--Incorrect-->BY005[Current goal: Tell the user about the file error.
Description: Inform the user that the file was not searchable 
because it contains content that cannot be printed.
The user needs to double-check the documents and re-upload them before letting stuff know.]

：
flowchart TD

including name and employee number.
Call getEmployeeStatus to get the employee status,
and judge the identity of the employee based on the returned employee_name and employess_num.
If the identity is correct, the employee will be informed of the result of the document printing. 
Only if the identity is correct, the following steps can be proceeded.
If the identity is wrong, apologize to the user.]

and according to the returned is_result
to determine whether the application is successful or not.]
YI002--Successful application-->YI008[Current goal: Confirm the number of pages in the document
Description: We need to confirm the number of pages in the file with the user 
so that we don't give the wrong file and cause information leakage.
Query the number of pages of the user's file based on the returned page_num which is one of the returned value of getPrintResults.
The user cannot be told the correct answer.]
YI008--Correct answer-->YI003[Subgoal: Ask the user how to get the file
Description: The user can go to the pickup location to pick the file up on his/her own,
or it can also be delivered by our staff.
The user needs to give clear requirements.]
YI008--Incorrect answer-->YI007[Current goal: Tell the failure of delivering of the file
Description: Let the user know that the number of pages of the document provided is inconsistent with that
of the document is about to be delivered now.
Deliveries are not possible in accordance with the Company's regulations.
If in doubt, the user can contact the person in charge of document printing for details.
If the user knows the answer is incorrect and re-gives the correct answer,
documents still cannot be delivered.]
YI003--Pick up on his/her own-->YI005[Current goal: Inform the pick-up location
Description: Based on the returned getPrintResults,
the user is told the location where the file is currently stored 
and its pickup number is pick_up_umber.
The user needs to pick up the file in time.]
YI003--Delivered by staff-->YI006[Current goal: Collect user workstation locations
Description: Collect the location of the user's workstation and collect the parameter: work_place.
Tell the user that the delivery of the document is about to be scheduled 
and the user needs to wait at the desk.
If there is no one at the workstation at the time of delivery, the delivery will not be made.]
YI002--Unsuccessful application-->YI004[Current goal: Inform the reason for the failure of the application
Description: There can be two reasons for the application failure. 
The first is the file is not up to specification. 
The second is the file volume is too large.
The user can contact the person in charge of document printing to understand the situation and then re-apply.]

The auxiliary parameter information in the workflow is as follows:
"work_place": "工位位置,是一个编号,比如“J810-1-4”、“J809-6-4”、"

6ecb63f6-74ce-4f9a-bdcb-d25c04dce41a.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
IW000(Start)--Book a hotel room-->IW001>Subgoal: Confirm room availability
Description: Ask the user for the hotel name and number of rooms required, call API:checkHotelAvailability to check room information, 
and confirm room availability based on the returned availability]
IW001--Rooms available-->IW002[Notify the user that rooms are available, and ask the user to confirm the booking]

Description: Apologize to the user for the unavailability of rooms due to high demand and numerous customers.

IW003--NO-->IW007[Apologize to the user for not being able to offer a suitable hotel.

b8a59056-00a4-4457-aa4f-f361ece37b1f.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
OG000(Start)--Use a seal-->OG001[Current goal: Confirm seal type
Description: Seal types include:
official seal, financial seal, invoice seal,
contract seal and invoice seal.
Confirm which type of seal the user needs?]
OG001--Official seal-->OG003[Current goal: Decide if an official seal is required. The official seal can be used for all letters, official documents, contracts, letters of introduction, certificates or other company materials issued in the name of the company. The official seal is not required in other cases.]
OG001--Financial seal or contract seal-->OG002[Current goal: Tell the user that the seal is not for external use
Description: Tell the user that the financial seal and contract seal are for exclusive use, not for external printing service.]
OG001--Invoice seal-->OG005["Current goal: Ask for invoice type
Description: Ask the user whether it is an electronic invoice or a paper invoice.
If it is an electronic invoice, is the word 'Seller (Seal)' 
in the lower right corner of the invoice? 
If not, it means that the electronic ticket does not need to be stamped.
if it is other types, it needs to be stamped."]
OG005 & OG003--Stamp is required-->OG007[Current goal: Confirm document type
Description: Confirm whether the document to be stamped is an electronic document or a paper document.]
OG007--Paper document-->OG008[Current goal: Teach the user how to stamp paper documents
Description: Inform the user that the financial office will stamp paper documents. 
The user needs to contact the head of the company about the location of the finance office.]
OG007--Electronic document-->OG006>Current goal: Request stamping
Description: Call applicationStamp to apply for a stamp. After the correct call, 
tell the user that the invoice seal will show the result after three hours, or six hours in the case of an official seal.]
OG005 & OG003--Stamp is not required-->OG004[Current goal: Inform that there's no need to stamp
Description: Inform the user that the required print request cannot be approved according to company regulations.
The main reason is that the application for a seal is not justified and 
does not meet the company's requirements or the use of a seal does not belong to the company regulations.]

1e9503fd-0460-4d53-bb02-80dc443cfee2.workflow:
：
flowchart TD

5c7032fe-6c0c-4a2d-8c43-cc6e006aa387.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
ES000(Start)--Early leave or tardiness-->ES001[Current goal: Ask if the user is aware of any early leave or tardiness
Description: The user has a record of leaving early or arriving late today, ask if he/she is aware of it.]
ES001--Unaware-->ES002[Current goal: Inquire if the user has checked in
Description:  If there is no record of early leave or tardiness, it might be due to the user not checking in at the time clock.
We need to ask if the user failed to check in on the time clock.]
ES002--Did check in-->ES007[Current goal: Notify that the check-in failed
Description: The user said he/she has checked in, but we can't find any records here,
it may be the user's operation error. 
The user needs to use the clock-in machine in accordance with the regulations next time.]
ES002--Did not check in-->ES003[Current goal: Ask for the reason for early leave/tardiness
Description: Inquire whether the reason for early leave or tardiness is facial recognition failure, 
congestion or other reasons.]
ES001--Aware-->ES003
ES003--Face recognition failure-->ES004>Current goal: Collect user's facial information
Description: Call getUserPhoto to get the user's face information,
and judge whether it is true based on the returned result.
If it is not true, it means the user's facial information is wrong.
Ask the user to re-upload until the returned result is true]
ES003--Forgot to check in-->ES005>Current goal: Examine frequency of forgetfulness
Description: Call recordForgotPunch to get the number of times that the user forgot to check in this month,
and determine if it exceeds three times based on the returned forget_num]
ES005--Exceeds three times-->ES009[Current goal: Inform user of excess tardiness
Description: Inform the user that their tardiness exceeds three times,
and it has been recorded by the system.
Let the user not to be late again]
ES005--Does not exceed three times-->ES008[Current goal: Remind the user of timing
Description: The user has not forgotten to check in more than three times,
and ask the user not to be late again next time.]
ES003--Other reasons-->ES006[Current goal: Collect other reasons
Description: Collects the reason why the user did not check in.
Collect parameter: other_reason]

11fd35e3-a085-46ac-8321-47018196b9d9.workflow:
：
flowchart TD
SA000(Start)--Relieve-->SA001>Current goal: Confirm the user's identity
Description: Call getUserInfo to confirm the user's identity, 
and determine whether the user identity is correct or not based on the returned back_code]
SA001--Correct identity-->SA002[Current goal: Inquire about shift transfer deadline
Description: Ask the user about the shift transfer deadline. 
Is the shift time within three days 'inclusive' or beyond three days?]
SA001--Mistaken identity-->SA003[Current goal: Denial of services
Description: The user's identity is incorrect,
so the user's request for a shift transfer is denied.]
SA002--Within three days-->SA004[Current goal: Ask who will take over
Description: Ask if the user has found a successor,
who must be another employee of the same level in the company]
SA002--Beyond three days-->SA005[Current goal: apply in writing
Description: Tell the user that the shift time has exceeded three days
and a written application needs to be made by the supervisor.]
SA004--No successor found-->SA006[Current goal: Ask if the user needs help
Description: Ask if the user needs our help or continues to look for a successor on their own?]
SA004--A successor found-->SA007>Current goal: Collect shift information
Description: Call collectShiftInformation to collect shift information,
and inform the user to have the successor contact us for a shift transfer and fill out the information]
SA006--Find the successor on the user's own-->SA008[Current goal: Let the user find his/her successors
Description: The user is asked to find his/her successors.]
SA006--Find the successor here-->SA009>Current goal: Find exchangeable times
Description: Call getCanExchanged to obtain information on exchangeable employees, 
and check whether the information is empty based on the returned worker_object]
SA009--Information is not empty-->SA010[Current goal: Ask the user to contact on his/her own
Description: Tell the user the employee information in the worker_object,
and let the user reach out on his/her own.]
SA009--Information is empty-->SA011[Current goal: Ask if  the user will upload information
Description: Tell the user that no other employee has posted a shift request,
and ask if the user needs to upload information. 
After uploading information, other employees can see the user's application.]
SA011--Information uploaded-->SA012>Current goal: Upload the user's requests
Description: Call uploadUserRequest to upload the user's requests, and tell the user to be patient]
SA011--No information uploaded-->SA013[Current goal: Apologize to the user
Description: Apologize to the user for the unsatisfactory service provided to the user]

 Call reimburse based on the user's answer for moderation.]
